results.title: @paulg on X: Especially when you're young, beware of dismissing some things you're curious about ...
results.author: paulg
results.text: Especially when you're young, beware of dismissing some things you're curious about as unimportant. You risk pruning off outliers if you do that. A lot of great discoveries have come from investigating things everyone else thought were unimportant.| created_at: Sun Apr 20 19:56:54 +0000 2025 | favorite_count: 3586 | quote_count: 25 | reply_count: 92 | retweet_count: 370 | lang: en

results.title: @paulg on X: "There was one quality of mind which seemed to be of special and extreme advantage i...
results.author: paulg
results.text:
"There was one quality of mind which seemed to be of special and extreme advantage in leading him to make discoveries. It was the power of never letting exceptions pass unnoticed."
— Francis Darwin on his father| created_at: Sat Apr 19 22:51:55 +0000 2025 | favorite_count: 1508 | quote_count: 5 | reply_count: 41 | retweet_count: 100 | lang: en
